chinese: 這沒什麼好說的
english: There's nothing to tell!

chinese: 他不過是我的同事
english: He's just some guy I work with!

chinese: 少來了  你們都在約會了
english: C'mon, you're going out with the guy!

chinese: 這個男人一定有什麼問題
english: There's gotta be something wrong with him!

chinese: 他是駝背嗎  戴着假髮的駝背
english: So does he have a hump? A hump and a hairpiece?

chinese: 等等  他喫粉筆嗎
english: Wait, does he eat chalk?

chinese: 我只是不想你
english: Just, 'cause, I don't want her to go through

chinese: 重蹈我和卡爾的覆轍
english: what I went through with Carl

chinese: 拜託各位  放鬆點  這甚至不算是約會
english: Okay, everybody relax. This is not even a date.

chinese: 只不過是兩個人出去喫個飯
english: It's just two people going out to dinner

chinese: 而且不會上牀
english: and not having sex.

chinese: 聽起來像是和我約會
english: Sounds like a date to me.

chinese: 於是我回到了高中學校
english: All right, so I'm back in high school,

chinese: 我站在食堂中間
english: I'm standing in the middle of the cafeteria

chinese: 然後發現自己全身赤裸
english: and I realize I am totally naked.

chinese: 噢  做過那種夢
english: Oh, yeah. Had that dream.

chinese: 然後我低下頭  看見那裏有一部
english: Then I look down, and I realize there's a phone

chinese: 大哥大
english: there.

chinese: -那話兒變成了  -沒錯
english: - Instead of...?  - That's right.

chinese: -這種夢倒從未做過  -沒有
english: - Never had that dream. - No.

chinese: 突然  那電話響起來了
english: All of a sudden, the phone starts to ring.

chinese: 結果是我媽打來的
english: And it turns out it's my mother,

chinese: 這非常非常奇怪
english: which is very-very weird because-

chinese: 因爲她從來不打電話給我
english: she never calls me!

chinese: 嗨
english: Hi.

chinese: 這傢伙一張嘴打招呼  我就想自殺
english: This guy says hello, I wanna kill myself.

chinese: 你還好吧  親愛的
english: You okay, sweetie?

chinese: 我感覺有人把手伸入我的喉嚨
english: I just feel like someone reached down my throat

chinese: 抓住我的小腸
english: grabbed my small intestine,

chinese: 從我嘴裏扯出來
english: pulled it out of my mouth

chinese: 然後纏在我脖子上
english: and tied it around my neck...

chinese: 餅乾
english: Cookie?

chinese: 卡羅爾今天把她的東西搬走了
english: Carol moved her stuff out today

chinese: -我幫你泡杯咖啡  -謝了
english: - Let me get you some coffee.  - Thanks.

chinese: 不  不要  別再淨化我的靈氣了
english: No, no don't! Stop cleansing my aura!

chinese: 求你了  別碰我的靈氣  好嗎
english: No, just leave my aura alone, okay?

chinese: 我會沒事的  好吧
english: I'll be fine, alright?

chinese: 真的  各位  我希望她能幸福
english: Really, everyone. I hope  she'll be very happy.

chinese: -不  你不會  -沒錯  我不會的
english: - No you don't. - No I don't,

chinese: 去她的  她甩掉了我
english: to hell with her, she left me!

chinese: 你居然不知道她是女同性戀
english: And you never knew she was a lesbian...

chinese: 不知道  行了吧
english: No!! Okay?!

chinese: 爲何大家都繞着這個話題打轉
english: Why does everyone keep fixating on that?

chinese: 她都不知道  我怎麼會知道
english: She didn't know, how should I know?

chinese: 有時我希望自己也是個女同性戀
english: Sometimes I wish I was a lesbian...

chinese: 我大聲說出來了麼
english: Did I say that out loud?

chinese: 好了羅斯  瞧
english: Alright Ross, look.

chinese: 你現在很痛苦
english: You're feeling a lot of pain right now.

chinese: 你很生氣  很傷心
english: You're angry. You're hurting.

chinese: 要不要我給你支一招
english: Can I tell you what the answer is?

chinese: 脫衣舞俱樂部
english: Strip joint!

chinese: 別這樣  作爲光棍兒  爺們起來
english: C'mon, you're single! Have some hormones!

chinese: 我不想單身的  好嗎
english: I don't want to be single, okay?

chinese: 我只想  再次結婚
english: I just...I just wanna be married again!

chinese: 而我只想要一百萬美金
english: And I just want a million dollars!

chinese: 瑞秋
english: Rachel?!

chinese: 噢  天啊  莫妮卡  嗨  謝天謝地
english: Oh, God, Monica, hi! Thank God!

chinese: 我剛去了你家  可你不在
english: I just went to your building and you weren't there

chinese: 有個拿大錘子的傢伙說你可能會在這兒
english: and then this guy with a big hammer said you might be here

chinese: 結果你真的在這兒 你真的在這兒
english: and you are, you are!

chinese: -要來杯咖啡嗎  -無咖啡因的
english: - Can I get you some coffee?  - De-Caff

chinese: 好了  各位  這是瑞秋
english: Okay, everybody, this is Rachel,

chinese: 另一位林肯高中的倖存者
english: another Lincoln High survivor.

chinese: 這就是各位啦  這是錢德勒
english: This is everybody, this is Chandler,

chinese: 菲比  還有喬伊
english: and Phoebe, and Joey,

chinese: 還記得我哥哥羅斯嗎
english: and you remember my brother Ross?

chinese: -當然  嗨  -嗨
english: - Hi, sure! - Hi.

chinese: 你是想現在跟我們說說
english: So you wanna tell us now

chinese: 還是我們再等四位溼漉漉的伴娘過來
english: or are we waiting for four wet bridesmaids?

chinese: 噢  上帝  好吧
english: Oh, God...well,

chinese: 大概在婚禮前半個小時
english: it started about a half hour before the wedding.

chinese: 我當時在存放禮品的房間裏
english: I was in this room where we were keeping all the presents,

chinese: 看着調味汁瓶
english: and I was looking at this gravy boat.

chinese: 那是一件極其美麗的裏摩日細瓷調味汁瓶
english: This really gorgeous Limoges gravy boat.

chinese: 然後  突然間
english: When all of a sudden

chinese: 有糖嗎
english: Sweet 'n' Lo?

chinese: 我發現我對這個調味汁瓶
english: I realized, I realized that I was more turned on

chinese: 比巴瑞更能引發我的興奮感
english: by this gravy boat than by Barry!

chinese: 然後我真的嚇壞了
english: And then I got really freaked out,

chinese: 突然想到
english: and that's when it hit me:

chinese: 巴瑞真的超像薯頭先生
english: how much Barry looks like Mr. Potato Head.

chinese: 我是說  我總是覺得他眼熟
english: You know, I mean, I always knew he looked familiar,

chinese: 但是
english: but...

chinese: 不管怎麼說  我必須離開那裏
english: Anyway, I just had to get out of there,

chinese: 我開始想
english: and I started wondering

chinese: "我幹嗎這麼做  我這麼做是爲了誰"
english: "Why am I doing this, and who am I doing this for?"

chinese: 不管怎麼說  我不知該去哪裏
english: So anyway I just didn't know where to go,

chinese: 而且我知道我們有點疏遠了
english: and I know that you and I have kinda drifted apart,

chinese: 但是  你是我在這個城市
english: but you're the only person I knew

chinese: 唯一認識的人
english: who lived here in the city.

chinese: 還沒有被邀請參加婚禮
english: Who wasn't invited to the wedding.

chinese: 噢  我希望這不是個問題
english: Ooh, I was kinda hoping that wouldn't be an issue...

chinese: 我猜他送她一臺管風琴
english: Now I'm guessing that he bought her the big pipe organ,

chinese: 而她很不喜歡
english: and she's really not happy about it.

chinese: 爸爸  我只是  不能嫁給他
english: Daddy, I just... I can't marry him!

chinese: 對不起  我只是不愛他
english: I'm sorry. I just don't love him.

chinese: 可是對我來說就有關係
english: Well, it matters to me!

chinese: 噢  她真不應該穿那條褲子
english: Ooh, she should not be wearing those pants.

chinese: 要我說  推她下樓
english: I say push her down the stairs.

chinese: 推她下樓  把推她下樓  把推她下樓
english: Push her down the stairs! Push her down the stairs! Push her down the stairs!

chinese: 爸  你聽我說
english: C'mon Daddy, listen to me!

chinese: 這就好像  在我一生中
english: It's like, it's like, all of my life,

chinese: 所有人都一直告訴我"你是一隻鞋子
english: everyone has always told me, 'You're a shoe!

chinese: 你是鞋子  你是鞋子  你是鞋子
english: You're a shoe, you're a shoe, you're a shoe!'.

chinese: 可今天我停下來說
english: And today I just stopped and I said,

chinese: "如果我不想成爲一隻鞋呢"
english: 'What if I don't wanna be a shoe?

chinese: 如果我想當一個包包  或是一頂帽子呢
english: What if I wanna be a- a purse, y'know? Or a- or a hat!

chinese: 不  我不是要你給我買帽子
english: No, I don't want you to buy me a hat,

chinese: 我說我是一頂帽子
english: I'm saying I am a ha-

chinese: 這是比喻啦  爸爸
english: It's a metaphor, Daddy!

chinese: 這就是他的問題所在了
english: You can see where he'd have trouble.

chinese: 聽着爸爸  這是我的人生
english: Look Daddy, it's my life.

chinese: 也許我可以和莫妮卡住在一起
english: Well, well maybe I'll just stay here with Monica.

chinese: 我猜和莫妮卡一起住的人選已然敲定了
english: Well, I guess we've established she's staying here with Monica...

chinese: 也許那是我的決定
english: Well, maybe that's my decision.

chinese: 也許我不需要你的錢
english: Well, maybe I don't need your money.

chinese: 等等我說也許
english: Wait!! Wait, I said maybe!!

chinese: 深呼吸
english: Okay, just breathe...that's it.

chinese: 就這樣試着想些美好平靜的事物
english: Just try to think of nice calm things...

chinese: 玫瑰上的雨滴 小貓上的鬍鬚
english: Raindrops on roses and whiskers on kittens,

chinese: 還有門鈴  雪橇鈴  和啥啥的手套
english: doorbells and sleigh bells and something with mittens...

chinese: 啦啦啦  還有啥啥繩子
english: La la la something with string.

chinese: 還有一些
english: These are a few...

chinese: 我現在好多了
english: I'm all better now.

chinese: 我幫上忙啦
english: I helped!

chinese: 瞧  或許這樣反倒最好
english: Okay, look, this is probably for the best, y'know?

chinese: 你獨立了  可以主宰自己的人生
english: Independence. Taking control of your life.

chinese: 如有任何需求  儘管來找喬伊
english: And hey, you need anything, you can always come to Joey.

chinese: 我和錢德勒就住在對面
english: Me and Chandler live right across the hall.

chinese: 而且他經常不在家
english: And he's away a lot.

chinese: 喬伊  別再勾引她了
english: Joey, stop hitting on her!

chinese: 今天是她結婚的日子
english: It's her wedding day!

chinese: 怎麼啦  難道還有什麼明文規定不成
english: What, like there's a rule or something?

chinese: 請不要在這麼幹了  這聲音很煩人
english: Please don't do that again, it's a horrible sound.

chinese: 我是保羅
english: It's, uh, it's Paul.

chinese: 讓他進來
english: Buzz him in.

chinese: -保羅是誰  -調酒的那個保羅嗎
english: - Who's Paul? - Paul the Wine Guy, Paul?

chinese: 也許吧
english: Maybe.

chinese: 等等  你今晚的"非正式約會"對象
english: Wait a minute. Your 'not a real date' tonight

chinese: 是調酒師保羅
english: is with Paul the Wine Guy?

chinese: -他終於開口約你了嗎  -是的
english: - He finally asked you out?  - Yes!

chinese: 噢  這真是值得永久銘記的時刻
english: Ooh, this is a Dear Diary moment.

chinese: 瑞秋  我可以取消
english: Rach, wait, I...I can cancel...

chinese: 不  你去吧我沒事
english: Please, no, go, I'll be fine!

chinese: 羅斯  你沒事吧你要我留下來嗎
english: Uh Ross, are you okay? I mean, do you want me to stay?

chinese: 那樣最好
english: That'd be good...

chinese: -真的嗎  -纔怪 去吧
english: - Really? - No, go on!

chinese: 那可是調酒師保羅
english: It's Paul the Wine Guy!

chinese: 嗨  請進  保羅  這是
english: Hi, come in! Paul, this is...

chinese: 大家  各位  這是保羅
english: ...everybody, everybody, this is Paul.

chinese: -嘿  保羅  -你好
english: - Hey! Paul! - Hello!

chinese: 嗨  調酒師
english: Hi! The Wine Guy!

chinese: 抱歉  沒聽清你的名字  保羅  是嗎
english: I'm sorry, I didn't catch your name. Paul, was it?

chinese: 好了  坐會  馬上就好
english: Okay, sit down. Two seconds.

chinese: 噢  我剛拔掉四根睫毛  不是好兆頭
english: Ooh, I just pulled out four eyelashes. That can't be good.

chinese: 瑞秋  你  你今晚打算怎麼過
english: So Rachel, what're you, uh... what're you up to tonight?

chinese: 這個嘛  本來我應該
english: Well, I was kinda supposed to be

chinese: 在阿魯巴島度蜜月  所以  沒事做
english: headed for Aruba on my honeymoon, so nothing!

chinese: 對哦  你都不能去度蜜月  上帝
english: Right, you're not even getting your honeymoon, God..

chinese: 不過在阿魯巴島的這個時候  說到你的
english: No, no, although, Aruba, this time of year... talk about your

chinese: 大蜥蜴
english: big lizards...

chinese: 不管怎樣如果你今晚不想獨處的話
english: Anyway, if you don't feel like being alone tonight,

chinese: 喬伊和錢德勒要到我那兒
english: Joey and Chandler are coming over to help me

chinese: 幫我組合新傢俱
english: put together my new furniture.

chinese: 是呀  我們特別期待特別興奮
english: Yes, and we're very excited about it.

chinese: 真的很感謝
english: Well actually thanks,

chinese: 不過我今晚想待在這兒
english: but I think I'm just gonna hang out here tonight.

chinese: -今天真的很漫長  -好吧  當然了
english: - It's been a long day. - Oh, sure. Okay, sure.

chinese: 菲比你想來幫忙嗎
english: Hey, Pheebs, you wanna help?

chinese: 我倒希望能去幫忙  但我不想去
english: Oh, I wish I could, but I don't want to.

chinese: 我應該用一套這樣的小蝸桿
english: I'm supposed to attach a brackety thing to the side things,

chinese: 將托架裝在側面
english: using a bunch of these little worm guys.

chinese: 但我沒看見托架  也沒有看見什麼蝸桿
english: I have no brackety thing, I see no worm guys whatsoever

chinese: 而且我的腿麻了
english: and I cannot feel my legs.

chinese: 這是什麼
english: What's this?

chinese: 我也不知道
english: I have no idea.

chinese: -書架做好了  -全部完工
english: - Done with the bookcase!  - All finished!

chinese: 這是卡羅爾最愛喝的啤酒
english: This was Carol's favorite beer.

chinese: 她總是不用易拉罐喝  我該知道
english: She always drank it out of the can, I should have known.

chinese: 羅斯  我問你一個問題
english: Ross, let me ask you a question.

chinese: 她得到了傢俱  音響和很棒的電視機
english: She got the furniture, the stereo, the good TV-

chinese: 你得到什麼
english: what did you get?

chinese: 你們
english: You guys.

chinese: -天啊  -你被坑了
english: - Oh, my God. - You got screwed.

chinese: 天哪
english: Oh my God!

chinese: -天哪  -我知道  我是個大白癡
english: - Oh my God! - I know, I know, I'm such an idiot.

chinese: 她每週看四五次牙醫時
english: I guess I should have caught on when

chinese: 我心裏就該有數了
english: she started going to the dentist four and five times a week.

chinese: 我是說  牙齒能需要多幹淨呢
english: I mean, how clean can teeth get?

chinese: 我哥也碰到這種事了  他也很糾結
english: My brother's going through that right now, he's such a mess.

chinese: 你是怎麼熬過來的
english: How did you get through it?

chinese: 你可以嘗試  不小心砸爛她貴重的東西
english: Well, you might try accidentally breaking something valuable of hers,

chinese: -比如她的  -腿？
english: - say her... - ...leg?

chinese: 那也是種選擇  至於我嘛
english: That's one way of going through it, yeah. Me, I-

chinese: 我砸爛了她的表
english: I went for the watch.

chinese: 你真的把她的表弄壞了
english: You actually broke her watch?

chinese: 巴瑞  對不起  真是對不起
english: Barry, I'm sorry... I am so sorry...

chinese: 你一定認爲這件事跟
english: I know you probably think that this is all about

chinese: 我那天說你穿着襪子做愛有關
english: what I said the other night about you making love with your socks on,

chinese: 其實不是  是我的原因  我只是
english: but it isn't... it isn't, it's about me, and I just...

chinese: 喂  電話又斷了
english: Hi, machine cut me off again...

chinese: 不管怎樣  聽着
english: anyway...look, look,

chinese: 你知道最可怕的是什麼
english: You know what the scariest part is?

chinese: 萬一人這一輩子只有一個女人怎麼辦
english: What if there's only one woman for everybody, y'know?

chinese: 我是說如果你找了個女人
english: I mean what if you get one woman-

chinese: 然後就此過一生
english: and that's it?

chinese: 不幸的是  我唯一的女人愛的是  女人
english: Unfortunately in my case, there was only one woman- for her...

chinese: 你說什麼呢  "一個女人"
english: What are you talking about? 'One woman'?

chinese: 這就像是在說  你只能喫一種冰淇淋口味
english: That's like saying there's only one flavor of ice cream for you.

chinese: 讓我告訴你  羅斯  還有很多種口味
english: Lemme tell you something, Ross. There's lots of flavors out there.

chinese: 有巧克力堅果味  曲奇味還有香草味
english: There's Rocky Road, and Cookie Dough, and Bing! Cherry Vanilla.

chinese: 還可以和糖條  果仁  或者奶油一起喫
english: You could get them with Jimmies, or nuts, or whipped cream!

chinese: 這簡直是你一生中最大的喜事
english: This is the best thing that ever happened to you!

chinese: 你難道是八歲結的婚嗎
english: You got married, you were, like, what, eight?

chinese: 歡迎回到現實世界  拿起勺子開挖吧
english: Welcome back to the world! Grab a spoon!

chinese: 我真不曉得現在自己是真餓了還是慾火難耐
english: I honestly don't know if I'm hungry or horny.

chinese: 離我的冰箱遠點
english: Stay out of my freezer!

chinese: 自從她甩掉我之後  我就
english: Ever since she walked out on me, I, uh...

chinese: 怎麼了  你打算邊攪麪條邊講嗎
english: What?... What, you wanna spell it out with noodles?

chinese: 不  這該是第五次約會時候才說的事兒
english: No, it's, it's more of a fifth date kinda revelation.

chinese: 噢  這麼說會有第五次約會了
english: Oh, so there is gonna be a fifth date?

chinese: 你不想嗎
english: Isn't there?

chinese: 想  我想的
english: Yeah... yeah, I think there is.

chinese: 你剛纔想說什麼
english: What were you gonna say?

chinese: 好吧  自從她離開後
english: Well, ever-ev-... ever since she left me, um,

chinese: 我就一直無法過
english: I have, I haven't been able to, uh, perform,

chinese: 性生活
